content.raw:
I experimented a bit with homebrew in the following branch, but it's not loading the component library:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/branch/ign_tool_cmake#diff
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1357/

maybe because it's a component library that's linked to the main library? and maybe it's not working on mojave because of system integrity protection?
content.html:
I experimented a bit with homebrew in the following branch, but it's not loading the component library:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/branch/ign_tool_cmake#diff
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1357/

maybe because it's a component library that's linked to the main library? and maybe it's not working on mojave because of system integrity protection?
